message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.HC, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses the evolution of information retrieval systems from document retrieval to answer retrieval, which falls under the category of Information Retrieval (cs.IR). The study uses Amazon Mechanical Turk to investigate answer presentation and interaction approaches in a non-factoid question answering setting, which involves natural language processing (cs.CL) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The paper also discusses the perception and identification of good and bad answers, which relates to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG).
